title: Reddit - The heart of the internet
text: Can someone please explain the differences in 2s, 3s,4s ect I used to do aRC cars about 25 years ago, Tamiya frog and grasshopper were my last cars I drove. Could you please explain the difference about the batteries. The one I had before were trickle chargers and I am not too familiar with with this new way with loop batteries Thank you
